Freesound dataset.description: -audio-tagging-2019/data) - many different sound events. https://annotator.freesound.org/ and https://annotator.freesound.org/fsd/explore/ - The AudioSet Ontology is a hierarchical collection of over 600 sound classes and we have filled them with 297,159 audio samples from Freesound. This process generated 678,511 candidate annotations that express the potential presence of sound sources in audio clips.
